Custom Software in Grande Prairie

Custom Software Solutions for Grande Prairie Entrepreneurs

Custom-Built to Solve Real Problems

  • Internal tools for operations — dashboards, CRMs, task tracking
  • Data collection and reporting apps (web or desktop)
  • Custom APIs and third-party integrations
  • Cloud-based portals for clients, staff, or vendors

Pricing

Initial Consultation: Free — we'll review your needs and scope the project.

Hourly Development Rate: $100/hour — for flexible, ongoing development and custom solutions.

Fixed Project Quotes: Available after consultation, with clear milestones, deliverables, and timelines.

All code is clean, well-documented, and yours to own. We also provide ongoing maintenance, updates, and feature expansions as needed.

Let's Build the Right Tool for the Job

Whether you need a simple utility or a fully custom app, we'll help you build something functional, reliable, and maintainable. Call 780-330-9965 or get in touch to start planning.
